long_description: Keep up with your active life-this multi-function watch features three programmable alarms and a Fast Wrap(TM) watch strap for quick on/off. Keep track of what time it is at home when you're abroad; this watch simultaneously tracks two different time zones. Features chronograph with lap and split options, memory recall and a three-mode countdown timer. Three separate, easy-to-set daily alarms keep you on schedule; optional hourly chime. All-day Indiglo(R) back lighting; Night- Mode(R) option for unobtrusive lighting in low-light conditions. Fast Wrap watchband offers infinite adjustability for the right fit over or beneath clothing. Available in large 1-1/2" face diameter or mid-size 1-1/4" face diameter.
short_description: Keep up with your active life-this multi-function watch features three programmable alarms and a Fast Wrap(TM) watch strap for quick on/off.
